SEARCH
Package app.entity

Class BotPlayer

java.lang.Object
app.entity.Player
app.entity.BotPlayer
public class BotPlayer extends Player
This class contains the implementation of a Bot Player. BotPlayer class simulates a player and makes moves based on game state to simulate an AI opponent.

    Constructs a new BotPlayer with a specified deck and name.

  • Constructor Details

    • BotPlayer

      public BotPlayer(Deck deck, String name)
      Constructs a new BotPlayer with a specified deck and name.
      Parameters:
      deck - The shuffled instance of deck that everyone will be using that game.
      name - The name of the bot player.

  • Method Details

    • simulateRemoval

      public ArrayList<Card> simulateRemoval(Card playedCard, ArrayList<Card> simulatedParade)
      Simulates the removal of eligible cards without modifying the actual parade. Returns a list of cards that would be removed if the given card were played.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card played by the bot.
      simulatedParade - A simulation to see the effect of playing a card on the parade.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of type Card that would be removable based on the played card.

    • determineCardChoice

      public Card determineCardChoice(Game game)
      Bot Algorithm: This simple algorithm is aimed at collecting the least amount cards from the parade as possible The bot evaluates each card in its hand and selects the one that results in the fewest removals from the parade.
      Parameters:
      game - The current state of the game, used to access the parade and other game elements.
      Returns:
      Card The card selected by the bot to play.

    • discardCards

      public void discardCards(ArrayList<Player> gamePlayers)
      This method helps the bot to discard cards. The bot will try to keep up to two cards where it leads in colour, otherwise it chooses the cards with the lowest value.
      Parameters:
      gamePlayers - A list of all players in the game, used to compare who's collected what colours.

    • obtainHighestColourCounts

      public ArrayList<Integer> obtainHighestColourCounts(ArrayList<Player> gamePlayers)
      Calculates the highest counts of each colour collected by any player in the game.
      Parameters:
      gamePlayers - List of all players in the game.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of type integer, with the highest counts for each colour among the players.

    • takeTurn

      public void takeTurn(Game game, Card chosenCard)
      Performs the actions for a bot player's turn in the game. This includes playing a card, collecting eligible cards, and drawing a new card if the game hasn't ended.
      Specified by:
      takeTurn in class Player
      Parameters:
      game - The current game instance.
      chosenCard - The card chosen by the bot to play.
